      • run

        public void run()
        Main loop this keeps on checking the socket in a new thread for new socket channel messages, when found it gets tossed over to the client handler. If a new connection is detected, we check it for authentication and register it on our side, and finish up the handshake if all seems to be legit.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
